Neuroimage, 170, 400-411. Genon, S., Li, H., Fan, L., Müller, V. I., Cieslik, E. C., Hoffstaedter, F., ... & Moebus, S. (2017). Neuroimage, 169, 302-311. Tambini, A., Nee, D. E., & D'Esposito, M. (2018). Hippocampal-targeted theta-burst stimulation enhances associative memory formation. Hippocampal-prefrontal interactions in cognition, behavior and psychiatric disease. Frontiers in systems neuroscience, 9, 190. Burman, D. D. (2019).
